result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Corren D Mattox

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Transcript commencing 04/29/2014 PRELIMINAR HEARING received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 14cf1647 (31 Pages).

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Richard J. Johnson.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Antoni J. Apollo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for plea hearing. Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, court ordered case dismissed but read in for purposes of sentencing.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Richard J. Johnson.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Antoni J. Apollo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case called in Branch 25. Defendant has a pending homicide case in Branch 25 (14CF1647). Court pre-approves transfer of this matter to Branch 25 for purposes of a global resolution. Clerk notified Branch 15 of the transfer. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 1, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Richard J. Johnson in court, defendant Corren D Mattox not in court, in custody.  Megan M. Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Defendant has a pending homicide case. Case rescheduled for PROJECTED PLEA on 12/1/2014 at 8:30 am in Branch 15.

Attorney Richard J. Johnson in court, defendant Corren D Mattox not in court, in custody.  Megan M. Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Defendant has a pending homicide case. Case rescheduled for PROJECTED PLEA on 10/16/2014 at 8:30 am in Branch 15.

Attorney Richard J. Johnson in court. Stephan Nolten for Megan M. Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Defendant has a pending felony murder case. Case calendared for PROJECTED PLEA on 8/29/2014 at 8:30 am in Branch 15.
Per Chief Judge Directive of 14-08, parties are advised that effective August 3, 2014 this case will be assigned to Branch 15, Judge J. D. Watts, in Room G55 of the Criminal Justice Facility.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court, in custody.  Nathaniel Emery Adamson for Megan Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

No attorney appears for today's hearing.  Public defender's office notified of the next date.  Defendant should be produced for the next hearing.  Status conference scheduled for August 7, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Jan M. from the Public Defenders office stated they will have an attorney present for the Status of Counsel on 07-28-2014 at 01:30 pm before Branch 44.

Defendant Corren D Mattox not in court, Defendant in custody.  Nathaniel Emery Adamson appeared for Megan Williamson for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant not produced for purposes of this hearing. Attorney Kovac called the court stating he would not be able to make it to court this morning due to a hearing in Ozaukee County. Attorney Kovac stated the Public Defenders Office has been made aware that he is no longer the attorney of record, and should have an attorney present for this court appearance. Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel in Branch 44.  COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Letter dated 7-11-14 from public defender's office received and filed./ds

Attorney Peter J Kovac in court, defendant Corren D Mattox not in court, in custody.  William Levins appeared for Megan Williamson for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has not hired private counsel yet.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel conference in Branch 44.  Status conference scheduled for 07-21-2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Peter J Kovac.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Megan M Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

There were no motions filed.  Defendant states his mother is going to hire an attorney.  Defendant states he would like a new attorney.  Court allows Attorney Kovac to withdraw subject to a new attorney being appointed or hired.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 1, 2014 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Peter J Kovac in court, defendant Corren D Mattox not in court, in custody.  Nathaniel E Adamson for Megan Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Defendant has a pending homicide case in Br. 25.  Motions to be filed by 6-12-14; response/reply to be filed by 6-17-14.  Motion hearing scheduled for June 24, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Peter J Kovac.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Kevin Shomin for Megan Williamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Defense acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Information and waives reading.  Defendant remains silent as to Counts 1 & 2.  Court enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant as to both counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Peter J Kovac in court.  Nathaniel E Adamson for Megan Willimson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for Arraignment 5/22/2014. Discussion in chambers put on record.  Defense counsel is unable to appear on that date and is requesting an adjourned date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 44.  Arraignment scheduled for May 27, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Peter J Kovac.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Antoni J Apollo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state:Erik Gulbrandson-MPD Detective.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading.  Arraignment scheduled for May 22, 2014 at 08:30 am.
No use or possession of illegal or controlled substances without a valid prescription.    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Corren D Mattox in court with attorney Enku E Lin.  Defendant Corren D Mattox in custody.  Michael D Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 29, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
